name: TerraStrike
description:
(As this is HTML game, takes a minute or two to fully load before start).

-----

In 2074, Earth was invaded by aliens from a distant planet.

Their ultimate goal was to terraform our world by spreading a mysterious substance known as "creep." The invasion was swift and ruthless, and soon the aliens had conquered much of the planet. Humanity was left fragmented and struggling to survive in a world now controlled by the invaders.

But there is hope!

A small resistance has formed, determined to reclaim their home and defeat the alien threat. With limited resources and uncertain allies, the fate of the planet rests in their hands.

Will you join the fight and help save humanity?

-----

Game made for MyFirstGame Jam Winter 2023
https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-winter-2023

-----

Dev notes: We would like to expand on adding to game the main story line, in which you can lead your squad of tanks through this apocalyptical event. Also more tanks, aliens, weapons and battle mechanics. Let us know if you like it! 

Like the game? Leave comment here or check out our discord: https://discord.gg/DjNabGrs
